eidolon.persistent_soul_hearts.desc: 可随时间恢复的魂灵之心数量
eidolon.max_soul_hearts.desc: 最大可获得的魂灵之心数量
gui.eidolon.codex.title: 秘仪教典
eidolon.codex.page.monsters.zombie_brute: 僵尸蛮种是僵尸的罕见变种，它们比僵尸更强、更快，也更坚韧，但其他行为模式和僵尸没有区别。僵尸蛮种掉落腐肉、骨头，偶尔掉落僵尸之心。
eidolon.codex.page.monsters.wraith.title: 幽魂
eidolon.codex.page.monsters.wraith: 幽魂是短暂出现在世间袭击人类的亡灵，它们具有悬停在任意流体上的能力。并且，幽魂的利爪能造成激冷的减益效果。幽魂会掉落身上的褴褛之布，偶尔掉落寒冷的幽魂之心。
eidolon.codex.page.monsters.chilled: 激冷这种减益效果会冻结你的生命值，它会使得所有恢复生命的效果失效。幽魂的攻击或者某些咒语会给予这种效果。
eidolon.codex.page.monsters.giant_skelet: 巨型骷髅的出没位置，以及它们会做什么，都仍需研究探明……
eidolon.codex.page.monsters.necromancer: 亡灵巫师出现在村庄袭击的最后几波，能召唤亡灵奴仆为其作战。他们还能施放给予易伤减益的法术。亡灵巫师会掉落强大的召唤魔杖。
eidolon.codex.page.critters.slimy_slug: 黏性蛞蝓是出现在主世界的小生物，有黏性。它们完全无害，且可用南瓜种子繁殖。它们会掉落黏液球。
eidolon.codex.page.critters.raven.title: 渡鸦
eidolon.codex.page.critters.raven: 渡鸦是出现在森林中的黑色小鸟。可用甜菜种子驯服它们。它们会在飞行时掉落渡鸦羽毛。
eidolon.codex.page.ores.lead_ore.title: 铅
eidolon.codex.page.ores.lead_ore: 铅是一种出现在地下的普通金属。它所在的深度与铁类似。
eidolon.codex.page.ores.silver_ore.title: 银
eidolon.codex.page.ores.silver_ore: 银是一种出现在地下的闪亮金属。它所在的深度与金类似。银制武器对亡灵怪物效果很好。
eidolon.codex.page.pewter.title: 白镴
eidolon.codex.page.pewter: 白镴是一种可以用于许多魔法构造的铅基合金。它对魔法过程表现出完全的惰性，这使得它成为各种魔法设备和奥秘物品的首选构筑材料。
eidolon.codex.page.enchanted_ash.title: 附魔灰烬
eidolon.codex.page.enchanted_ash: 附魔灰烬是从骨头中精炼的净化粉末。它会排斥亡灵和死亡暗蚀的能量。可以在地面上用这种粉末画出线条，亡灵生物便无法跨过它们。
eidolon.codex.page.plants.title: 仪式刀
eidolon.codex.page.plants: 仪式刀是一把仪式用小刀，能对末影生物造成额外伤害，且有更高概率产出稀有掉落物。也能手持仪式刀右击收获特殊植物。
eidolon.codex.page.plants.1: 在丛林、沼泽、森林的某些经典植物上试试看吧。也许幸运能带你找到些稀有的种子。这些特殊的植物需要种在种植坛里。开发者笔记：可以到丛林树叶、睡莲、蕨，还有白色的花朵上用仪式刀。
eidolon.codex.page.researches.0.title: 研究台
eidolon.codex.page.researches.0: 研究台能让你从周遭事物中获取全新知识。先合成笔记工具，再对某种研究对象使用，就算是开始研究了。再后，把笔记放进研究台，并照所给步骤提供材料。最后用奥秘火漆封页即算完成。仍未完成，仅有流浪者/幽魂和烈焰人的研究有效。
eidolon.codex.page.decorations.title: 装饰性方块
eidolon.codex.page.decorations: 将附魔灰烬和灵魂宝石混合入料，就做成了远古砖。这些砖可以用来制作许多种装饰性方块。此外，你还可以将骨头堆成骨堆，用于装饰墓穴。
eidolon.codex.page.nature_index.0.title: 自然现象
eidolon.codex.page.rituals.0.title: 仪式
eidolon.codex.page.brazier.0.title: 火盆
eidolon.codex.page.brazier.0: 火盆可以用来发起魔法仪式。所有的仪式均由往火盆上放上物品，再用打火石点燃起始。火盆点燃后可用空手熄灭，这样就可以驱散当前的仪式效果。
eidolon.codex.page.brazier.1: 仪式通常需要其他物品。将物品放在火盆周围的台座上，就可向仪式提供物品。一些仪式会有额外的特殊要求，教典中会对每种特殊要求进行具体说明。
eidolon.codex.page.item_providers.0: 石之手是最基础的物品台座。将石之手放在火盆附近，再将物品放在它的手心上，就能向附近的仪式提供原材料。
eidolon.codex.page.item_providers.1: 某些仪式需要核心物品来调整其效果。所有此类物品均已在相应仪式介绍页上标明，且它们必须放在暗蚀焦点上，仪式才会成功。在其他情况下，暗蚀焦点的作用和石之手相同。
eidolon.codex.page.crystal_ritual.title: 结晶仪式
eidolon.codex.page.crystal_ritual: 结晶仪式允许自复活亡灵中提取灵魂碎片。仪式物品吸收完成的片刻之后，周围的所有亡灵生物即遭毁灭，并在它们所在之处残余若干灵魂碎片。
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.0.title: 召唤僵尸
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.0: 初级召唤仪式会在火盆上方召唤出一只亡灵生物。有许多用于召唤弱小亡灵生物的变种。
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.1.title: 召唤骷髅
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.2.title: 召唤幻翼
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.3.title: 召唤凋灵骷髅
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.4.title: 召唤尸壳
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.5.title: 召唤溺尸
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.6.title: 召唤流浪者
eidolon.codex.page.summon_ritual.7.title: 召唤幽魂
eidolon.codex.page.allure_ritual.title: 诱惑仪式
eidolon.codex.page.allure_ritual: The ritual of alluring is supernaturally desirable to peaceful creatures. From a large range, animals will gradually be drawn towards its epicenter.
eidolon.codex.page.repelling_ritual: The dual of the ritual of alluring, the presence of this ritual drives away monsters within a large area.
eidolon.codex.page.deceit_ritual.title: 欺骗仪式
eidolon.codex.page.deceit_ritual: Those who practice the dark arts may find themselves attracting scrutiny and distaste from the villagers nearby. The ritual of deceit serves to defend one's reputation, causing villagers to more quickly forget transgressions against them.
eidolon.codex.page.time_rituals.0.title: 日光仪式
eidolon.codex.page.time_rituals.0: The ritual of daylight is fairly simple. When cast during the night, the ritual will accelerate time until the sun once again rises, at which point the ritual will be dispelled.
eidolon.codex.page.time_rituals.1.title: 月光仪式
eidolon.codex.page.time_rituals.1: A counterpart to the daylight ritual, the moonlight ritual will accelerate time during the day, ceasing once the sun sets.
eidolon.codex.page.purify_ritual.title: 净化仪式
eidolon.codex.page.purify_ritual: The purification ritual cures those afflicted with the curse of undeath. Upon activation, the ritual will cure any zombified villagers near the brazier. Additionally, zombified piglins and hoglins will be restored to their uncorrupted forms.
eidolon.codex.page.sanguine_ritual.0: The sword of sapping deals wither damage in addition to its normal attack, and any damage inflicted by this withering heals the user. In addition to the ritual requirements displayed, ten hearts' worth of living creatures must be present for the ritual to consume.
eidolon.codex.page.sanguine_ritual.1: The sanguine amulet stores regenerated health, accumulated while the user is at full health, and heals the user from this store when they are hurt. Twenty hearts' worth of living creatures must be present for the ritual to devour.
eidolon.codex.page.recharge_ritual: The ritual of recharging allows the user to recharge their wands. When activated, the ritual will consume the ingredients, restoring the durability of the wand on the focus.
eidolon.codex.page.capture_ritual.title: 奴役仪式
eidolon.codex.page.capture_ritual: The ritual of enthralling allows the user to capture the soul of undead creatures around the brazier, binding them to the 召唤魔杖. The ritual will capture the soul of the mobs into the staff, allowing you to summon them at your will. Shift-Click with the staff to cycle through the captured mobs.
eidolon.codex.page.artifice.title: 炼化
eidolon.codex.page.wooden_stand.0.title: 药剂师酿造台
eidolon.codex.page.wooden_stand.0: The apothecary stand is a contraption inspired by the alchemical devices brought back from the nether. It is capable of brewing potions without need for blaze powder when placed above a boiling crucible. However, it cannot enhance their strength or duration.
eidolon.codex.page.wooden_stand.1.title: 真菌新芽
eidolon.codex.page.wooden_stand.1: Through the use of a crucible, mushrooms can be grown into sprouting fungus. This herbal reagent is capable of supplanting nether wart in the brewing of awkward potions.
eidolon.codex.page.tallow.0.title: 油脂
eidolon.codex.page.tallow.0: It is possible to reduce the oils in rotting flesh down to a pleasant, waxy tallow using the high heat of a blast furnace. The resulting product is quite smooth and pliable, and makes for a valuable ingredient in several recipes.
eidolon.codex.page.tallow.1.title: 蜡烛
eidolon.codex.page.tallow.1: Adding a wick to a block of tallow forms a nice candle. 蜡烛s primarily serve as decorative sources of light. They may also be mounted in candlesticks, allowing them to be attached to walls.
eidolon.codex.page.crucible.0.title: 坩埚
eidolon.codex.page.crucible.0: The crucible is a sturdy basin in which alchemic processes may be performed. It must be prepared thus: place the cauldron above a fire or other heat source, then fill it with water and wait for it to boil.
eidolon.codex.page.crucible.1: Once boiling, a crucible is ready for use. Alchemy recipes have multiple steps, that must be performed in order. Start by adding the items from the first step. Once the water's color changes, add the next step's items, and stir the crucible a few times if specified.
eidolon.codex.page.arcane_gold.title: 秘金
eidolon.codex.page.arcane_gold: It is possible to alchemically imbue gold with a small amount of magical energy. The resulting metal is stronger and more magically conductive than mundane gold, and is put to good use in the construction of magic items.
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.0.title: 硫磺
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.0: An essential alchemical element, the manufacture of sulfur can be done easily in a crucible. The addition of ash causes the sulfur impurities in ordinary coal to precipitate into a fine powder, which can be retrieved and used elsewhere.
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.1.title: 死亡精粹
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.1: A wretched ingredient, this coarse black powder contains the very nature of undeath distilled within it. Its value in necromantic processes in unmatched by any other material.
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.2.title: 精炼深红
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.2: Reacting the fiery flora of the nether with sulfur results in this glittering red substance. Reduced from the wrathful elements of the nether realm, surely a purpose will reveal itself eventually.
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.3.title: 终末矿灰
eidolon.codex.page.reagents.3: This strange material results from the oxidation of an ender pearl. When prepared in a crucible, the resulting powder is incredibly fine, and it is hard to identify individual grains. It appears to retain some of the apporting power of an intact pearl.
eidolon.codex.page.soul_gems.title: 小型灵魂宝石
eidolon.codex.page.soul_gems: While soul shards are sufficient sources of magical power for basic magic, they must be fused and augmented for use in higher-level constructions. A magician may perform this process alchemically, accreting the shards into a larger soul gem.
eidolon.codex.page.shadow_gem.title: 暗影宝石
eidolon.codex.page.shadow_gem: The shadow gem is a peculiar material. It gleams like a diamond, yet seems to resist illumination. It provides an excellent and durable focus for magical energies.
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.0.title: Flesh Purification
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.0: The purifying salts in enchanted ash do more than simply repel undead creatures. When enchanted ash is applied directly to rotten flesh, it removes its impurity and leaving behind a rather useful piece of hide.
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.1.title: Flesh Decomposition
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.1: It is possible to use alchemy to accelerate decomposition of flesh. Though pork is displayed as an example here, this process may be provided almost any raw meat.
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.2.title: Gunpowder Synthesis
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.2: While gunpowder naturally occurs in certain creatures, it is a simple compound that may also be synthesized artificially using a crucible.
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.3.title: Gilding
eidolon.codex.page.basic_alchemy.3: It is possible to use a crucible to more efficiently gild items. Through the use of a catalyst, the amount of gold required is quartered.
eidolon.codex.page.warped_sprouts.0: Akin to the growth of sprouting fungus, warped fungus may be seeded in a crucible to produce warped sprouts. The resulting buds have a visible glow to them, and appear to have latent powers relating to teleportation.
eidolon.codex.page.warped_sprouts.1: When warped sprouts are consumed, they grant an anchoring effect, which blocks teleportation while the effect lasts. The effect may be lengthened by brewing potions from the warped sprouts.
eidolon.codex.page.inlays.title: 嵌材
eidolon.codex.page.inlays: Metal inlay is a simple method for durably inscribing sigils and symbols into magical constructs. While mundane on their own, inlays of pewter and arcane gold appear frequently in magical formulae.
eidolon.codex.page.basic_baubles.title: Basic Baubles
eidolon.codex.page.basic_baubles: While flashy, these trinkets are most often used as a base for other items. Still, these items have been touched by the arcane, and a novice magician may feel a slight boost to their tenacity while wearing them.
eidolon.codex.page.magic_workbench.title: 魔力工作台
eidolon.codex.page.magic_workbench: It is hard to express a complex magical recipe on a mundane workbench. For this purpose, the magic workbench is essential. This workbench can be used like any mundane workbench, but additionally provides four slots for magical components and tools.
eidolon.codex.page.angel_sight.title: 大天使之视
eidolon.codex.page.angel_sight: The archangel's sight is an ancient ring that guides your ranged attacks to the nearest target. When worn, arrows and similar projectiles will aim to the nearest entity. Shift-click to change mode, ignoring other players or aiming only to enemies.
eidolon.codex.page.void_amulet.title: 虚空护符
eidolon.codex.page.void_amulet: This marvelous amulet is imbued with a supernatural defense. When worn, projectiles that would otherwise strike the bearer are instead absorbed and nullified. However, the amulet must recharge afterwards, and can only be used again after about ten seconds.
eidolon.codex.page.warded_mail.title: 守卫锁甲
eidolon.codex.page.warded_mail: Inscribed with runes and imbued with sanctifying salts, the warded mail provides an excellent defense against arcane attackers. When worn, any armor worn over it is bolstered, able to defend against magical attacks that would normally pierce through.
eidolon.codex.page.soulfire_wand.title: 魂火魔杖
eidolon.codex.page.soulfire_wand: An excellent display of the latent power within a shadow gem! The soulfire wand fires brilliant bolts of energy when swung, that deal hefty damage to just about any target.
eidolon.codex.page.bonechill_wand.title: 刺骨魔杖
eidolon.codex.page.bonechill_wand: The bonechill wand chills the very soul of any being unlucky enough to be taken under its curse. Upon striking a target, an icy hold grips them, preventing all health regeneration in the same manner as the claws of a wraith.
eidolon.codex.page.summoning_staff.title: 召唤魔杖
eidolon.codex.page.summoning_staff: The summoning staff is a powerful tool for any necromancer. When used, it will summon a creature stored inside with the ritual of Enthralling. Shift-Click with the staff to cycle through the available summons. Bonk the summoned creature to return it inside the staff.
eidolon.codex.page.raven_cloak.title: 渡鸦斗篷
eidolon.codex.page.raven_cloak: The raven cloak is a magical garment that transform in a pair of wings. When worn, the wearer may tap or hold the jump key to flap the wings or glide. While flying, the wearer may press the sneak key to slowly land.
eidolon.codex.page.reaper_scythe.title: 死神镰刀
eidolon.codex.page.reaper_scythe: A handy - if grim - tool for the enterprising necromancer. When an undead creature is felled by the reaper scythe, its body is destroyed and its soul is crystallized, permitting a more active approach to harvesting soul shards.
eidolon.codex.page.death_scythe.title: 死亡使者镰刀
eidolon.codex.page.death_scythe: A corrupted and deadly upgrade of the reaping scythe. The deathbringer scythe is unable to gather soul shards, but corrupts the entity hit by inflicting 亡灵. While under this effect an entity becomes an undead, burning in the sun and becoming immune to hunger and poison but also unable to eat.
eidolon.codex.page.cleaving_axe.title: 开劈之斧
eidolon.codex.page.cleaving_axe: This fearsome axe serves as a slow but powerful weapon. When a creature is slain by it, it may occasionally drop its head.
eidolon.codex.page.soul_enchanter.0: The soul enchanter leverages the power of souls to enchant items with great precision. Unlike a typical enchanting table, enchantments have no level requirement, and it is possible to enchant previously-enchanted items as well.
eidolon.codex.page.soul_enchanter.1: However, it also bears some limitations. The soul enchanter is only able to provide single, first-level enchantments, or increase the level of an existing enchantment. To achieve a high level, many repeated enchantments are necessary, demanding many levels and soul shards.
eidolon.codex.page.reversal_pick.title: 颠倒之镐
eidolon.codex.page.reversal_pick: This peculiar tool seems to disobey normal material properties. The harder a block is, the quicker this pick breaks it; the softer a block is, the more resistance it gives.
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.0.title: 邪恶织物
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.0: A cloth imbued with with the power of a shadow gem, wicked weave is the ideal material for magical accoutrements. It is strangely durable, and highly conducive to arcane energies.
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.1.title: 术士帽
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.1: The warlock's hat grants boosts to the wearer's magical offenses. When worn, an additional fifty percent is added to any magic or wither damage dealt by the wearer. Wither damage dealt also slightly heals the player.
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.2.title: 术士斗篷
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.2: The warlock's cloak grants boosts to the wearer's magical defenses. When worn, magic and wither damage dealt to the wearer is reduced by half.
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.3.title: 术士长靴
eidolon.codex.page.warlock_armor.3: The warlock's boots improve the wearer's mobility. When worn, reductions in movement speed due to obstacles and terrain are mitigated by half. Additionally, the wearer becomes immune to the slowness effect.
eidolon.codex.page.gravity_belt.title: 引力腰带
eidolon.codex.page.gravity_belt: A peculiar belt, the gem inset within its buckle feels almost lighter than air. When equipped, the effects of gravity are greatly reduced, significantly slowing downwards acceleration and quartering damage from falls.
eidolon.codex.page.prestigious_palm: This glove-shaped charm allows the user to touch that which previously escaped their grasp, approximately doubling normal interaction range.
eidolon.codex.page.mind_shielding_plate: When worn, this plate resists any unwanted intrusions into your head. It also mitigates experience loss on death, allowing the retention of three quarters of the bearer's levels. Finally, the plate grants immunity to the nausea effect.
eidolon.codex.page.resolute_belt.title: 坚毅腰带
eidolon.codex.page.resolute_belt: An exceedingly heavy belt. So heavy, in fact, that it renders the user almost immovable to foes. Any knockback received by the bearer is not only negated, but reflected, repelling the attacker.
eidolon.codex.page.glass_hand.title: 玻璃之手
eidolon.codex.page.glass_hand: A most mysterious and dangerous item, to be used with only the highest of caution. The glass hand grants unnatural strength, doubling the damage of all attacks. However, this comes at a price: any damage that befalls the user will be quintupled.
eidolon.codex.page.soulbone_amulet.title: 魂骨护符
eidolon.codex.page.soulbone_amulet: A most peculiar amulet, made from the bones of the dead and the heart of a wraith. It allows the wearer to gain ethereal hearts upon killing an enemy, up to 10 by default.
eidolon.codex.page.soulbone_amulet.1: 魂灵之心 will be displayed over your health and are consumed before normal hearts. By wearing the full vestige of the bonelord you are able to regen a portion of your ethereal hearts, but those relics might as well be just a legend.
eidolon.codex.page.theurgy.title: 神力
eidolon.codex.page.intro_signs.0.title: 符文与咏唱
eidolon.codex.page.intro_signs.0: For any who venture into the arcane, knowledge of signs - ancient symbols which represent arcane concepts - is essential. The signs chapter of this book displays all known signs, and allows the selection and chanting of a sequence of them.
eidolon.codex.page.intro_signs.1: Chants have various magical properties, which will appear here as new signs are learned. The majority of signs are known only to higher powers, but some basic ones may be known to earthly magical practitioners. Try giving this book to one, and they may teach you what they know.
eidolon.codex.page.effigy.title: 稻草塑像
eidolon.codex.page.effigy: To attempt to communicate with the powers that be, an icon is necessary. The straw effigy may be fairly rudimentary in its construction, but when placed atop an altar, it is something to direct your prayers to. Maybe they will be heard?
eidolon.codex.page.altars.0.title: 祭坛
eidolon.codex.page.altars.0: In addition to an effigy, an altar is necessary for most theurgical rites. 祭坛 may be constructed in any shape or size. An icon of some kind must be placed atop the altar, in addition to any other magical paraphernalia one desires.
eidolon.codex.page.altars.1: Placing occult objects atop an altar may improve its power and capacity. A more powerful altar improves the efficacy of prayers and sacrifices, and improving capacity allows the altar to imbue creatures and objects with greater amounts of magical energy.
eidolon.codex.page.altar_lights.0.title: 祭坛光源
eidolon.codex.page.altar_lights.0: Certain light sources are capable of enhancing an altar, usually its power, and only sometimes its capacity. If multiple lights are provided, only the highest power and capacity improvements out of all the lights will take effect.
eidolon.codex.page.altar_skulls.0.title: 供奉头颅
eidolon.codex.page.altar_skulls.0: The skulls of undead creatures are powerful occult objects, capable of significantly empowering an altar. If multiple skulls are provided, only the highest power and capacity improvements out of all the skulls will take effect.
eidolon.codex.page.altar_herbs.0.title: 供奉草药
eidolon.codex.page.altar_herbs.0: Certain uncommon flora and fungi are able to enhance an altar, when potted and placed atop it. As per usual, if multiple herbs are placed atop the altar, only the highest power and capacity improvements across the herbs will take effect.
eidolon.codex.page.goblet.title: 高脚杯
eidolon.codex.page.goblet: 高脚杯s are the ideal means to provide an offering to a deity. Slaying a creature over the goblet will fill it with blood, which may be used in certain rites. Merely having a goblet on one's altar will also increase its capacity by two.
eidolon.codex.page.censer.title: 香炉
eidolon.codex.page.censer: 香炉s are a means of providing offerings to a deity without the need for blood. They may be filled with certain herbs, which will be burned and consumed when the censer is lit. Merely having a censer on one's altar will also increase its capacity by two.
eidolon.codex.page.dark_prayer.0.title: Dark Prayer
eidolon.codex.page.dark_prayer.0: Perform the chant above before an altar to pray to the dark lord, and attempt to draw their favor.
eidolon.codex.page.dark_prayer.1: The dark prayer, as is true with all prayers, may only be performed once per day. Additionally, while repeatedly praying will draw more and more favor, other rites are often required. Whenever you learn a new sign or rite, make sure you try it at least once. Further knowledge may be revealed to you.
eidolon.codex.page.light_prayer.0.title: Light Prayer
eidolon.codex.page.light_prayer.0: Perform the chant above before an altar to pray to the light lord, and attempt to draw their favor.
eidolon.codex.page.light_prayer.1: The light prayer, as is true with all prayers, may only be performed once per day. Additionally, while repeatedly praying will draw more and more favor, other rites are often required. Whenever you learn a new sign or rite, make sure you try it at least once. Further knowledge may be revealed to you.
eidolon.codex.page.animal_sacrifice: Perform the chant above before an altar and a goblet filled with animal's blood. Sacrifices are highly-valued, but may only be performed once per day.
eidolon.codex.page.censer_offering.title: 香炉祭献
eidolon.codex.page.censer_offering: Perform the chant above before an altar and a censer filled with a special compound. 香炉 offerings are highly-valued, but may only be performed once per day.
eidolon.codex.page.dark_touch.0.title: Touch of Darkness
eidolon.codex.page.dark_touch.0: The dark lord has granted you the ability to touch certain items with dark power. Perform the above chant while looking at a certain dropped item.
eidolon.codex.page.dark_touch.1: When cast on pewter inlay, the inlay will be transfigured, taking the form of an unholy symbol.
eidolon.codex.page.holy_touch.0.title: Touch of Light
eidolon.codex.page.holy_touch.0: The light lord has granted you the ability to touch certain items with holy power. Perform the above chant while looking at a certain dropped item.
eidolon.codex.page.holy_touch.1: When cast on gold inlay, the inlay will be transfigured, taking the form of a holy symbol. The symbol can be used to scare undead expending mana.
eidolon.codex.page.stone_altar.title: 石制祭坛
eidolon.codex.page.stone_altar: While a wooden altar is sufficient for basic rites, to perform more powerful magic a stone altar is necessary. Stone altars have the same characteristics and may be upgraded the same as wooden ones, but enable more powerful rites to be performed.
eidolon.codex.page.unholy_effigy.title: 长者雕像
eidolon.codex.page.unholy_effigy: The dark lord is pleased, and has revealed to you some knowledge of their otherworldly appearance, which you have represented in this statue. It should allow you to perform more powerful dark rites than your crude straw one would.
eidolon.codex.page.holy_effigy.title: 圣洁雕像
eidolon.codex.page.holy_effigy: The light lord is pleased, and has revealed to you some knowledge of their otherworldly appearance, which you have represented in this statue. It should allow you to perform more powerful light rites than your crude straw one would.
eidolon.codex.page.villager_sacrifice: Perform the above chant before a goblet of villager blood. Must be chanted before an elder statue on a stone altar.
eidolon.codex.page.lay_on_hands.title: Lay on Hands
eidolon.codex.page.lay_on_hands: Perform this chant on living beings that are hurt or afflicted to ease their pain. Can also be used on self with lesser effect.
eidolon.codex.page.villager_cure.title: Cure Villager
eidolon.codex.page.villager_cure: Perform the above chant before a villager who has been zombified.
eidolon.codex.page.villager_zombie.title: Zombify
eidolon.codex.page.villager_zombie: Perform this twisted chant on a villager to turn them into a zombie villager, must be chanted before an elder statue on a stone altar. The dark lord will be pleased to see another join their ranks.
eidolon.codex.page.wicked_sign.title: 邪恶符文
eidolon.codex.page.wicked_sign: This wicked sign is the mark of an individual who has spurned righteousness and salvation to seek personal power. Be wary of the creatures and invocations it commands, lest you find yourself corrupted by it.
eidolon.codex.page.sacred_sign.title: 神圣符文
eidolon.codex.page.sacred_sign: This sacred sign is the emblem of the forces of light. It represents the fight against evil and undeath, and an unwavering devotion to the higher powers of creation.
eidolon.codex.page.blood_sign.title: 血液符文
eidolon.codex.page.blood_sign: Beyond blood itself, the blood sign symbolizes raw life force. As a component of chants, it is used to describe and manipulate the force within living things.
eidolon.codex.page.soul_sign.title: 魂魄符文
eidolon.codex.page.soul_sign: The soul sign is the etching by which souls are attached to beings. Those who know it have been given knowledge of the intangible, and those who speak it forth should be aware of the power - their own, or anothers - that they are toying with.
eidolon.codex.page.mind_sign.title: 心灵符文
eidolon.codex.page.mind_sign: The mind is what separates intelligent beings from the world's other creatures. It is only with the mind, and the use of the mind sign, that complex magic becomes possible for the mortal practitioner.
eidolon.codex.page.flame_sign.title: 火焰符文
eidolon.codex.page.flame_sign: The flame sign is the symbol of the flames that cleanses and purifies, but also destroys and consumes. As the flame sign is used in chants, it calls forth the ability to manipulate the element of fire.
eidolon.codex.page.winter_sign.title: 寒冬符文
eidolon.codex.page.winter_sign: The winter sign is the symbol of the cold that freezes and preserves, but also chills and kills. As the winter sign is used in chants, it calls forth the ability to manipulate the element of ice.
eidolon.codex.page.harmony_sign.title: 和谐符文
eidolon.codex.page.harmony_sign: 和谐 is the balance of the world, the state of being in which all things are in their proper place.
eidolon.codex.page.death_sign.title: 死亡符文
eidolon.codex.page.death_sign: 死亡 is the end of all things, the finality of life. WIP
eidolon.codex.page.warding_sign.title: 守卫符文
eidolon.codex.page.warding_sign: 守卫 is the act of protecting something from harm. WIP
eidolon.codex.page.magic_sign.title: 魔法符文
eidolon.codex.page.magic_sign: 魔法 encompasses all things that are not of the physical world, but links you and your patron. WIP
eidolon.codex.rune.sin: A vile and wicked sigil. Adds one 邪恶 sign to the end of the spell.
eidolon.codex.rune.crimson_rose: Thrives upon bloodshed. Consumes two 邪恶 signs from the end of the spell, and adds one 血液 sign in their place.
eidolon.codex.page.light.title: Light
eidolon.codex.page.light: The chant of light is a simple spell that creates a small ball of light at the cost of mana. It is useful for illuminating dark places.
eidolon.codex.page.fire_touch.title: Fire Touch
eidolon.codex.page.fire_touch: The chant of flames is a simple spell that creates sparks of fire at the cost of mana. It is useful for lighting campfires and braziers, or burning enemies.
eidolon.codex.page.chill_touch.title: Chill Touch
eidolon.codex.page.chill_touch: The chant of winter is a simple spell that freezes the entity or block hit at the cost of mana. It is useful for cooling drinks, or freezing enemies to the bone.
eidolon.codex.page.enthrall.title: Enthrall [WIP]
eidolon.codex.page.enthrall: This advanced chant is a spell that allows to enslave the undeads hit at the cost of mana. The cost of the spell will vary depending on the health of the target.
eidolon.codex.page.enthrall.1: Enthralled entities won't harm you and will try to fight with you but won't follow you.
eidolon.codex.page.smite.title: Smite [WIP]
eidolon.codex.page.smite: This advanced chant is a spell that allows to smite the undeads hit at the cost of mana. This spell will deal high damage to undeads and will make them flee from you for a short time.
eidolon.codex.page.spells.title: 已揭示的咒语
eidolon.message.prayer_cooldown: You should wait before using this prayer again.
eidolon.angels_sight.mode.0: The arrows will target the nearest entity.
eidolon.angels_sight.mode.2: The arrows will target the nearest hostile entity.
